apart.core — Protocol’s Core Components¶

This package contains the core of the protocol implementation.

The most important module is the node module, that codes the behavior of nodes, and thus the protocol. The network module is also important, since it manages the nodes, the topology graph, and more generally, the entire network.c

Other modules (tables, messages, poolscontrolled_traffic_rates) are secondary, and provide are used by the node module (respectively, they code the node’s tables, the messages exchanged, the neighbor batching pools, and the traffic counters).

Submodules

  • apart.core.network — Network and Network Manager
  • apart.core.node — Node Code
  • apart.core.tables — Routing Tables
  • apart.core.messages — Network Messages
  • apart.core.pools — Message Pools and Batching
  • apart.core.controlled_traffic_rates —- Controlled traffic rates mechanism
  • apart.core.protocol_constants — Misc. Constants
